articles.title: 8 NBA teams are in a white-knuckle race for 6 playoff spots, and the stakes are huge
articles.description: Patrick Smith/Getty Eight teams in the NBA's Western Conference are competing for six playoff spots. The stakes are enormous for all of the teams, with potentially significant implications, from star players eyeing the exit or coaches going on the hot seat. W…

articles.author: sdavis@businessinsider.com (Scott Davis), Scott Davis
articles.title: While the rest of the NBA falls apart, the Warriors are so far ahead that they're finding new ways to keep themselves busy
articles.description: Steve Kerr said the Golden State Warriors need to "reset" and re-focus their priorities. While Kerr said he doesn't focus on individual games with his team, he said he sees larger trends that need fixing. At a time when the rest of the NBA seems to be falling…

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Team LeBron edges Team Stephen 148-145 in All-Star Game - ABC News
articles.description: ABC News Team LeBron edges Team Stephen 148-145 in All-Star Game ABC News Indiana Pacers' Victor Oladipo gets ready for a dunk while wearing a mask from the movie "Black Panther" during the NBA All-Star basketball slam dunk contest Saturday, Feb. 17, 2018, in…

articles.author: Scott Mautz
articles.title: NBA Star Damian Lillard Just Gave a College Player These 11 Stellar Words of Encouragement
articles.description: The Portland Trailblazers superstar took time to lift up a younger star who was likely feeling down.

articles.title: NBA MVP Rankings: Anthony Davis, Damian Lillard on the rise
articles.description: Is James Harden running away with the MVP? There are new names in the discussion that keep The Beard from being anywhere close to unanimous.

articles.title: Lillard rejoins team after day of 'highs and lows'
articles.description: All-Star Damian Lillard rejoined the Trail Blazers on Friday night after what he called a day of 'highs and lows.' On Thursday, his first son was born and then his half-brother was shot in an incident in Portland.

articles.title: Lillard, McCollum outduel Durant as surging Trail Blazers extend win streak to nine
articles.description: Behind 58 combined points from Damian Lillard (28) and CJ McCollum (30), the Trail Blazers prevented the Warriors from overtaking the Rockets for the No. 1 seed in the West.

articles.title: Lowe's 10 things: Ridiculous CP3, Porzingis promo and the Patty Mills experience
articles.description: This week's highlights include LeBron's draft pick, a high-IQ Warrior, bad All-Star promotions and more.

articles.title: Jimmy Butler's absence creates opportunity for young Wolves to step up
articles.description: As the Timberwolves fight to preserve their playoff positioning without their All-Star swingman, they'll count on the young duo of Andrew Wiggins and Karl-Anthony Towns to take on an increased, more challenging role.

articles.title: Lowe's 10 things: Quit the All-Star whining
articles.description: This week's highlights include some Jimmy Butler magic, Brandon Ingram's solo act, teams that might be making moves and more.

articles.title: Power Rankings: Harden and the Rockets continue their run
articles.description: Houston is rolling to the tune of 12 straight wins. Golden State just ran a clinic against OKC. But only one can claim the top spot heading into the season's homestretch.

articles.title: Lowe's 10 things: The epic NBA tank battle is coming
articles.description: This week's highlights include James Harden's defense, Jaylen Brown, a gorgeous Nuggets play and bad teams being very bad.

articles.title: Damian Lillard brings iconic 'Bape Camo' to the court
articles.description: When the Trail Blazers star takes the court during All-Star Weekend, he'll be wearing a special-edition version of his signature sneaker made in collaboration with Adidas and Japanese streetwear company A Bathing Ape.

articles.title: Follow live: Griffin makes Pistons debut vs. Cavaliers
articles.description: The newly acquired Blake Griffin won't be making his debut Tuesday against LeBron James & Co., but that won't stop his new team from trying to jumpstart its new era.

articles.title: NBA player rankings: Steph Curry right back to his MVP form
articles.description: The Warriors point guard and a scorching DeMar DeRozan battle for the top spot in our weekly rankings.

articles.title: LeBron selects Kyrie, Durant for All-Star squad
articles.description: LeBron James and Stephen Curry have drafted their teams, with James going with former teammate Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant among his selections.

articles.title: Adidas goes back to basics for McDonald's All American Game jerseys, sneakers
articles.description: Gone are the sleeves and the camo, making way for a more traditional, red-and-white look for tonight's showcase of the best high school players in the nation (7 p.m. ET, ESPN).

articles.title: Zach Lowe's 2018 NBA All-Star picks
articles.description: John Wall or Bradley Beal? Should Ben Simmons make the cut? And how many Warriors in the West? With the league set to announce All-Star reserves, it's time to release our picks for the full 12-man rosters.

articles.title: ESPN Forecast: James Harden will win first MVP in landslide
articles.description: With less than three weeks left in the season, our ESPN Forecast panel predicts James Harden will run away with the MVP award. But who will finish second?

articles.title: Trae Young: Time has come for me to enter NBA draft
articles.description: Oklahoma guard Trae Young always dreamed of making the NCAA tournament, but now he's moving on to his next big goal -- the NBA.
